entry.title: Catholic Hymn
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 18.00 â†’ HK$Â 8.00 (HK$Â 8.00 ~ HK$Â 18.00)ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Catholic Hymn is a Christian hymn app which contains all the hymns in the Catholic Hymn Book. The app contains hymn collections that can be used during personal prayers or during the celebration of The Holy Mass.Â  This app can also be used by other Christian denominations.Â  It was designed to give you a seamless experience during usage and has a lot of cool features including: - Ability to search for hymns with either the hymn number or hymn title - Categorized hymns according to different seasons and events in the church like Hymns for Advent, Hymns for Christmas, Entrance Hymns, Offertory Hymns, Communion Hymns, Recessional Hymns, etc. - Ability to Bookmark your favorite hymns. This is a very handy app to have on your phone which will help you worship God through praises better.

åº”ç”¨æˆªå±
